It also explains the differences between 800G and 800GbE and 800GbE development and deployment timeline. Last, this video shows a live demo of a 36x800G line card delivering 28.8Tbps full duplex traffic, on all ports, linerate, inside a 8808 distributed system.

Baremetal deployment is also called as CNDP deployment, it allows cnBNG CP to be deployed without need of running hypervisor. CNDP deployment offers 20% performance improvement over traditional hypervisor/VM based deployment.
